data.title: Getcreativesanantonio.com: The Cultural Calendar for the City of San Antonio, Texas
data.meta_description: A Multi-Visionary Artist, born & raised in San Antonio, Texas. I found a great interest in art & crafts at the young age of 7.  Always inspired by the many forms of art. My creative interests & talents lead me to join Say Si Art Organization in the Visual Arts program from 2001-2005. My first … Continued
data.meta_site_name: Getcreativesanantonio.com: The Cultural Calendar for the City of San Antonio, Texas
data.text:
Tell us about your work (style, approach, philosophy, subject and/or theme):

Jewelry-making, Graphic Design, Painting and Mentoring in Visual Arts are all the areas I feel at home.

Follow me on Social-Media, I am actively participating in local vendor markets to sell my art & jewelry.
